item.title: Why is Solarium Green Energy Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: On 19-Feb, Solarium Green Energy Ltd’s stock price fell sharply to ₹160.10, marking a 5.6% decline and hitting a new 52-week and all-time low of ₹159 during intraday trading.
